snippet: A senior United Nations aid official said Tuesday that in camps for the stateless Muslim group known as the Rohingya, in Myanmar, she witnessed the worst human suffering she had ever seen in such places.
abstract: Kang Kyung-wha, senior United Nations aid official, says she has witnessed the worst human suffering she has ever seen in such places in camps for stateless Muslim group known as the Rohingya, in Myanmar; over 100,000 people have been displaced since fighting between ethnic minority insurgents and the government erupted in June 2011, ending a 17-year cease-fire.
lead_paragraph: A senior United Nations aid official said Tuesday that in camps for the stateless Muslim group known as the Rohingya, in Myanmar, she witnessed the worst human suffering she had ever seen in such places.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
